vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.18;
son of: Methushael (H4967); married to Adah (H5711) and Zillah (H6741);
father of: Jabal (H2989), Jubal (H3106), Tubal-cain (H8423), Naamah (H5279)
§ Lamech = "powerful"
1) the 5th lineal descendant from Cain, husband of Adah and Zillah, father of sons, Jabal, Jubal, and Tubal-cain, and daughter, Naamah
2) father of Noah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Metusael; descendiente de Caín; (b)   hijo de Matusalén; descendiente de Set
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉麥 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "強而有力的"
1) 該隱的第五代子孫, 亞大和洗拉的丈夫, 雅八、猶八、土八該隱及拿瑪的父親
2) 挪亞的父親
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
拉麦 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "强而有力的"
1) 该隐的第五代子孙, 亚大和洗拉的丈夫, 雅八、犹八、土八该隐及拿玛的父亲
2) 挪亚的父亲

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.25;
son of: Methuselah (H4968);
father of: Noah (H5146)
Also named: Lamech<\i> (Λάμεχ "Lamech" G2984)
§ Lamech = "powerful"
1) the 5th lineal descendant from Cain, husband of Adah and Zillah, father of sons, Jabal, Jubal, and Tubal-cain, and daughter, Naamah
2) father of Noah
